## ERC20TransferTier.deploy() method

Deploys a new ERC20TransferTier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static deploy(signer: Signer, args: ERC20TransferTierDeployArgs, overrides?: TxOverrides): Promise<ERC20TransferTier>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signer | Signer | An ethers.js Signer |
|  args | [ERC20TransferTierDeployArgs](./rain-sdk.erc20transfertierdeployargs.md) | Arguments for deploying a ERC20TransferTier |
|  overrides | [TxOverrides](./rain-sdk.txoverrides.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ERC20TransferTier](./rain-sdk.erc20transfertier.md)<!-- -->&gt;
